    • createDiscount

      public static boolean createDiscount(int type, String code, String description, float amount, String startDate, String endDate, int isActive, String discountLevel, String title)
      A method to create a discount
      Parameters:
      type - The discount type (0 for percent, 1 for cash)
      code - The string to represent the discount code
      description - The string to represent the discount's description
      amount - This is the amount for the discount (.## for percent, raw number for cash)
      startDate - The date when this discount becomes usable
      endDate - The date when this discount expires
      isActive - If the discount is active or not (0 for not active, 1 for active. inactive discounts cant be used)
      discountLevel - The string to represent the discount level
      title - The title of the game if the discount is item level
      Returns:
      True if discount was created successfully. False if not.

    • checkDiscount

      public static String checkDiscount(String code)
      This is to check for a discounts existence to make sure we do not get multiple of the same code
      Parameters:
      code - the given discount code
      Returns:
      a string that represents the results of the query

    • saveGame

      public static boolean saveGame(Global.Game game)
      Saves a specified game object to the database
      Parameters:
      game - The game specified that was edited
      Returns:
      True if save was successful. False if not.

    • addGame

      public static boolean addGame(String title, float price, String genre, String console, int quantity, String description, int restock, int isActive)
      A method to add a game to the database
      Parameters:
      title - A string that represents the games title
      price - The games price for 1 copy
      genre - A string to represent the games genre
      console - A string that represents the games console
      quantity - The amount in stock
      description - The game's description
      restock - The restock threshold
      isActive - Wether the game is inactive or active (0 for inactive, 1 for active. Inactive games can not be viewed by customers)
      Returns:
      True if game was added successfully. False if not.

    • checkGame

      public static String checkGame(String title, String system)
      This is to check if the game already exists or not
      Parameters:
      title - The games title
      system - The system the game is on
      Returns:
      A string that represents the result of the query

    • tradeReport

      public static boolean tradeReport(ArrayList<Global.Game> addedGames, ArrayList<Global.Game> newGames, float cost)
      A method that will create insert details for trade-ins in the database
      Parameters:
      addedGames - An array list of the games that have an updated quantity
      newGames - An array list of all the games now added to the system
      cost - The amount spent on the trade-in
      Returns:
      True if report was successfully made. False if not.
